coreAttributes.name: Sugar Carrot Cube
coreAttributes.description: A bright orange sugar cube, which smells of carrots. From the horse-shoe icon on the wrapper, this is obviously meant as a snack for horse-morphs, but is nevertheless edible for all races.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot stronger...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 3)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(peel)] off the paper packaging and [npc.verb(pop)] the Sugar Carrot Cube into [npc.her] mouth. The strong taste of carrots instantly hits [npc.her] [npc.tongue], but before [npc.she] [npc.has] any time in which to relish the flavour, it dissolves into a sweet, sugary mess, which [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(gulp)] down.
